Spoolman.description:
Spoolman is a self-hosted Web service and database to manage your 3D printer filament spools. Rock-on guide.

Based on the official docker image, available for amd64 and arm64 architecture.

8000.description: Enter the port number you would like to use for the Spoolman Web interface.
8000.label: Web interface port [e.g. 7912]

/home/app/.local/share/spoolman.description: Choose a share for Spoolman database storage
/home/app/.local/share/spoolman.label: Spoolman Database Storage [e.g. spoolman-db]
